name: Aerodynamics Academy
about: Aerodynamics Academy, located in the Axarquía region of Málaga, Spain, is a premier aviation school with over 25 years of experience. Founded in 1998, it has evolved from a small private pilot school to one of Europe's best aviation training institutions. The academy boasts a 62,000 m² campus at Vélez-Málaga airport, featuring modern facilities, 13 hangars, and a state-of-the-art flight simulator centre. With an AOC and E-ATO certifications, Aerodynamics offers comprehensive training programs, including ATPL, CPL, and cabin crew training. The school is known for its well-maintained fleet of aircraft and its commitment to quality education, ensuring students are well-prepared for careers in the aerospace industry. Aerodynamics Academy provides a full training package, including accommodation, and is dedicated to helping students achieve the highest academic standards.
